author: ceposta
msg: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/APLO-273 - Update the websocket example to use the latest stomp.js which supports STOMP 1.1 (including heart-beating).
Jeff Mensil provided patch. Thank you!

author: jacopoc
msg: Fixed code that was broken a lot of time ago by commit 883226; this prevented the (seldom used) screen.use-cache attribute to work properly. Thanks to K Sharad Bhushan for the patch (OFBIZ-5080).

author: meteatamel
msg: OAK-489 - FetchNodesAction need to limit the versions of a node
Reintroduce depth as a parameter to the constructor of FetchNodesAction as depth is essential to fetching nodes.
